function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases transmission between wild and domestic animal or human populations","Impact":"Altered wildlife behavior and ecosystem disruption","Mitigation":"Control of disease transmission, management of wildlife populations","Technologies":"Fencing, disease surveillance and monitoring","People":"Wildlife, domestic animals, human populations","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Pollutants spread by aquatic and airborne pathways","Impact":"Impact on ecological processes across large scales","Mitigation":"Policies to control pollution, environmental monitoring","Technologies":"Water and air quality monitoring technologies","People":"Ecosystems, wildlife, human populations","Owner":"Environmental protection agencies, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Military infrastructure, defoliation, wildlife exploitation, and trade in conflict areas","Impact":"Devastating effects on species abundance and persistence","Mitigation":"Regulation and enforcement of wildlife trade, conservation efforts","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, wildlife tracking, conservation management tools","People":"Displaced people, wildlife, human populations","Owner":"Government authorities, wildlife conservation organizations"}]}
